mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, open_ids, create_time, update_time, del_flag from t_wechat_template_admin_notification where id = #{id}
select id, tenant_id, open_ids, create_time, update_time, del_flag from t_wechat_template_admin_notification limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_wechat_template_admin_notification(tenant_id, open_ids, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{tenantId}, #{openIds}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update t_wechat_template_admin_notification
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
open_ids = #{openIds},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
